channelinfo.Descriptionription: Shows information about the current channel or mentioned channel.

userinfo.Descriptionription: Shows information about yourself or another user.

ping.Descriptionription: Gets current ping to Discord's servers

commands.Descriptionription: List all of the bot's commands from a certain module. You can either specify the full name or only the first few letters of the module name.

help.Descriptionription: Either shows a help for a single command, or DMs you help link if no parameters are specified.

time.Descriptionription: Shows the current time and timezone for the specified location.

image.Descriptionription: Searches Google Images with the specified query, returns first result.

randomimage.Descriptionription: Searches Google Images with the specified query, returns a random result.

movie.Descriptionription: Searches omdb with the specified query, returns first result.

weather.Descriptionription: Looks up weather of specified city using Dark Sky's api.

urbandict.Descriptionription: Searches urban dictionary for with the specified query.

addquote.Description: Adds a new quote with the specified name and message.

showquote.Description: Shows a random quote with a specified name.

quotesearch.Description: Shows a random quote for a keyword that contains any text specified in the search.

quoteid.Description: Displays the quote with the specified ID number. Quote ID numbers can be found by typing `{0}liqu [num]` where `[num]` is a number of a page which contains 15 quotes.

quotedelete.Description: Deletes a quote with the specified ID. You have to be either server Administrator or the creator of the quote to delete it.

listquotes.Description: Lists all quotes on the server ordered alphabetically or by ID. 15 Per page.

textoimage.Description: Returns an image showing the specified mathematical formula, using the TeX language.

pokemon.Description: Returns a short summary of the specified Pok√©mon

ability.Description: Returns the description of the specified ability
